articles.author: Alexandra Olson
articles.title: Half of US workers favor employee shot mandate: AP-NORC poll - Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Half of American workers are in favor of vaccine requirements at their workplaces, according to a new poll , at a time when such mandates gain traction  following the federal government's full approval of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Half of American workers are in favor of vaccine requirements at their workplaces, according to a new poll, at a time when such mandates gain traction following the federal governments … [+5058 chars]

articles.title: Kamala Harris says evacuating Americans, Afghan allies is Biden admin's 'highest priority' - Fox News
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris said evacuating Americans and U.S. allies in Afghanistan is the administration’s "highest priority" while answering reporters’ questions in Vietnam on Thursday.
articles.content:
